line_1: His daring mind thy humanizing glooms
line_2: And taught to warble 'mid the village tombs.

line_1: Roves, when the glimmering twilight glooms,
Alone, amid the deadly midnight glooms,
line_2: My strengthen'd soul its various powers assumes,

line_1: His daring mind thy humanizing glooms
line_2: And taught to warble 'mid the village tombs.

line_1: From fields of death to Woodstock's peaceful glooms
Long ailes of Cypress waved their deepen'd glooms,
line_2: And quivering spectres grinn'd amid the tombs;

line_1: And gilds the horrors of the deepen'd glooms.
line_2: Suspended crags and gaping gulphs illumes,

line_1: That veil around these awful glooms,
line_2: In verdant age, that ever blooms.
